title: 32c02         Profit sharing plans or trusts.
text:
Payments
made to employees pursuant to a bona fide profit-sharing plan or trust which
meets the requirements of Reg 549 need not be included in the regular rate of
pay.
html: Payments made to employees pursuant to a bona fide profit-sharing plan or trust which meets the requirements of Reg 549 need not be included in the regular rate of pay.
